deploy.startCommand: sh -c "chmod -R a+rwx /data 2>/dev/null; if mkdir -p /data/.openclaw /data/workspace 2>/dev/null; then export OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR=/data/.openclaw OPENCLAW_WORKSPACE_DIR=/data/workspace; else mkdir -p /tmp/.openclaw /tmp/workspace && export OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR=/tmp/.openclaw OPENCLAW_WORKSPACE_DIR=/tmp/workspace; fi && export OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TRUSTED_PROXIES='100.64.0.0/24' && exec npx openclaw gateway --bind lan --port ${PORT:-8080} --auth token --token \"$OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TOKEN\" --allow-unconfigured"
